Articles.Content:
Maybe not applicable to stock aero, but seems like having center of lift behind center of mass isn't always enough on space planes. Sometimes plane gets flipped around backwards on re-entry and is impossible to right.

Seems like your drag profile is different depending on which way you are pointed relative to prograde, i.e. angle of attack.

If so, then it'd be nice to have a way to analize that.

Something like what exists for FAR:
